thread.title: Derrick Rose Is Missing The Knicks Game And Nobody Knows Why
thread.title_full: Derrick Rose Is Missing The Knicks Game And Nobody Knows Why

author: Patrick Redford
title: Derrick Rose Is Missing The Knicks Game And Nobody Knows Why
text:
Go to permalink Photo: Doug McSchooler/ AP 
About half an hour before the Knicks tipped off against the Pelicans, the Knicks cryptically announced that Derrick Rose was “not with the team.” 
Normally, the planned absence of a team’s starting point guard is noted far before the start of the game. Rose is also not dealing with any immediate injuries, and if the team was holding him out for medical reasons, they’d likely have noted it. Adrian Wojnarowski reported this evening that nobody really knew where Rose was, but that he was “unhappy” by getting benched on Friday. 
We reached out to the Knicks for comment, and their full statement is below: Advertisement 
He’s not with the team. 
We’ll update this post if more information becomes immediately available. Recommended Stories
